author: Melissa Korn
title: USC President C.L. Max Nikias Steps Down
text:
The embattled president of the University of Southern California, C.L. Max Nikias, agreed to step down Friday evening, just over a week after allegations were made public that a longtime gynecologist at the school’s student-health center had sexually abused patients for years.
Rick J. Caruso, chairman of the subcommittee of the executive committee of the school’s board of trustees, said in a letter to the school community Friday that Dr. Nikias and the board had agreed to “begin an orderly transition and commence the process...
